revised_title: Control Analysis of Photosynthetic Sucrose Synthesis: Distribution of Elasticity Coefficients and Flux-Control Coefficients in Cytosolic Fructose 1,6-Bisphosphatase and Sucrose Phosphate Synthase
tldr: The article discusses the control analysis of photosynthetic sucrose synthesis, focusing on the distribution of elasticity coefficients and flux-control coefficients in the cytosolic fructose 1,6-bisphosphatase and sucrose phosphate synthase. The author explains how control is shared between these enzymes and how changes in their properties can affect the overall process of photosynthesis.
